binaryOption.toolTip: Synchronously set by hardware when ACMP output has a valid edge defined by ACMOD.\n Cleared by writing a 0 to this bit. Writing a 1 to this bit has no effect.\n The setting of this bit lags the ACMPO ... bus clocks
Allows the ACMP output to be placed onto external pin

choiceOption.toolTip: Determines the sensitivity modes of the interrupt trigger

binaryOption.toolTip: Selects the reference for the DAC

intOption.toolTip: Selects the DAC output voltage using the formula: \n \tVoutput= (Vin/64)x(DACVAL[5:0]+1) \n The Voutput range is from Vin/64 to Vin, the step is Vin/64

bitmaskOption.toolTip: Bitmask controlling which ACMP pins are available as analogue inputs

choiceOption.toolTip: Bitmask controlling analogue function on ACMP pin
